Few words about Ryboa Haima

An ISO 9001: 2015 certified company, providing top quality products and superior field services for the Oil and Gas industry. Ryboa Haima is the prominent name in electro-mechanical, civil, Instrumentation and environmental engineering services; in addition to manpower supply, transportation, Logistics, and provision of heavy equipment. Since 1992 RHTC has served the Oman market with top quality products and unmatched customer service.

Ryboa Haima strives consistently to develop its services that are not limited to one type of service but has sought to diversify its services according to the requirements and needs of clients and companies producing oil and gas not only at the local level but also abroad as held strategic partnerships with international companies with a good reputation from China, Malaysia, and other countries.

These Services are designed to maintain a good reputation, optimize excellence and increase overall productivity by reducing uncertainty, risks or any harm to persons at work and equipments through effective HSE management. The end to end services as per the client requirements complying with Quality and Safety standards is our prime Motto to withstand in the industry at all times. We believe success lies in building long-term relationships with our clients, our business partners, our staff, and the communities in which we work and live.

Ryboa Haima Trading Co (Known as RH) Is a leading Omani Company and catering its services to the Oil & Gas Sector in the field of Construction industry, Waste Management, Water Management, Warehouse Management, Facility Management, Well Hoist/Trucking, Rig Move Support Services, Manpower Supply, Rental of Vehicles & Equipment’s & other activities. RH operates with high standards of Health, Safety, and Environmental protection and has located its assets strategically enabling to mobilize manpower, equipment and provide other services to any part of Sultanate of Oman.

Our competence to deliver and maintain high standards in the Oil & Gas industry sector has resulted in the acquisition of many major contracts in Sultanate of Oman. Ryboa Haima Trading Co is a leading 100% Omani owned group of companies with active participation in Oman’s Oil & Gas sector industries since 1992. The company posted a growth of approximately 100% during the period from 2002 to 2016 and is currently rated one of the leading Omani Contractors in the Sultanate of Oman.

Our Vision

Our vision is to become The Trusted Partner with everyone whom we have a relationship, be they clients, employees, shareholders, suppliers, members of the communities in which we are working or any other group or individual.

Learn more

Our Mission

To Provide the highest standard of services while providing pioneer, value -added Engineering Services to our customers with an ever-increasing spotlight on Oil and Gas production, Refining, Exploration and other major industries.

Building Trust, Delivering Excellence through Unmatched Engineering Services and Lasting Partnerships
